EmailTemplate.name: Global_Nurture_Jetwave_BGA.201711_Global_Email_Jetwave_BGA_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Be an Early Adopter, Not a Laggard ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Get Onboard with Global High-Speed Wi-Fi Now! <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/jetwave-high-speed-satellite-communications-hardware]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
More than 100 business jets <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2017/october/over-100-business-jets-now-flying-with-honeywell-inmarsat-high-speed-wi-fi]]> have already installed Honeywell’s JetWave™ system, which exclusively powers Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX service. This rapid adoption is attributed to forward-thinking manufacturers, maintenance professionals and owners/operators who were unhappy with previous connectivity options and believed in the Honeywell-Inmarsat solution.
There’s a reason why JetWave is the only high-speed connectivity system to be selected by all major business jet manufacturers – it’s the only high-speed, global, in-flight Wi-Fi service for the business aviation industry available today!
What are you waiting for? Contact Honeywell to learn more now!
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
